entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
